name: samseg
description: Runs SAMSEG for segmentation of brain structures from MRI volumes.

inputs.name: Input MRI volume(s)
inputs.description: List of input NIFTI (.nii/.nii.gz) or MGZ volumes (e.g., T1w, T2w) that are co-registered and have same grid/voxel dimensions.

inputs.name: Output directory
inputs.description: Path to the directory where SAMSEG output will be stored.

inputs.name: Threads
inputs.description: Number of threads to use for processing.

inputs.name: Separate Pallidum
inputs.description: Separate the pallidum from white matter (useful if input includes T2w or FLAIR).
